Replace.Text: 解锁建造者建造矿山的能力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。若靠近山脉单元格，额外+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。 每相邻1个工业区地块，额外+1 [ICON_Production]生产力。若本城有工作坊，额外+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。 -1魅力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]只能在丘陵或有效资源上建造。如果建在奢侈品资源或战略资源上，城市则可以利用该资源。

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Mines.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] Production. Extra +1 [ICON_Production] Production if adjacent to mountaion tiles. +1 [ICON_Production] Production for each adjacent Industrial Zone District. Extra +1 [ICON_Production] Production if the city owns a Workshop. -1 Appeal. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can be built on hills or valid resources. If built on Luxury or Strategic resources, the city will gain use of that resource.

解锁建造者建造采石场的能力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。每相邻1个工业区单元格，额外+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。若本城有工作坊，额外+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。 -1魅力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]只能在有效资源上建造。如果建在奢侈品资源上，城市则可以利用该资源。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]城市中每有一个采石场，则对远古奇观加速15%，对古典奇观加速10%，对中古和文艺复兴的奇观加速5%.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Quarries.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] Production. +1 [ICON_Production] Production for each adjacent Industrial Zone District. Extra +1 [ICON_Production] Production if a city owns a Workshop. -1 Appeal. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can only be built on valid resources. If built on a Luxury resource, the city will gain use of that resource. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]For each Quarry the city owns, +15% Production for ancient Wonders, 10% for classical Wonders and 5% for medieval era and renaissance era Wonders.
解锁建造者建造渔船的能力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。若城市有港口区域，则+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。每相邻1个港口区域则+2 [ICON_Gold] 金币。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]只能在有效资源上建造。如果建在奢侈品资源上，城市则可以利用该资源。

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Fishing Boats.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] Production. If built on Luxury resources, the city will gain use of that resource.
解锁建造者建造种植园的能力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Gold] 金币。每相邻1个商业中心单元格则+2 [ICON_Gold] 金币。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]只能在有效资源上建造。如果建在奢侈品资源上，城市则可以利用该资源。

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Plantations.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Gold] Gold. Can only be built on valid resources. +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for each adjacent Commercial Hub District. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If built on Luxury resources, the city will gain use of that resource.
解锁建造者建造牧场的能力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。若城市有马厩建筑，则牧场额外+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]只能在有效资源上建造。如果建在战略资源上，城市则可以利用该资源。

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Pastures.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] Production. Extra +1 [ICON_Production] Production if the city owns a Stable.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can only be built on valid resources. If built on Strategic resources, the city will gain use of that resource.
解锁建造者建造农场的能力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。若本城有水渠，则相邻淡水或水渠的农场+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]只能建在草原或平原上。解锁“土木工程”市政后也能建造在草原丘陵或平原丘陵上。

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Farms.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food. Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Camps.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food. Can only be built on forest or valid resources. Once Guilds is unlocked it can also be built on Rainforest. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If built on Luxury resources, the city will gain use of that resource.
解锁建造者建造伐木场的能力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。若沿河，额外+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]只能建在树林上。解锁“公会”市政后也能建造在雨林上。
